channel.title: Barrage Glitch
channel.description: Whats the Fix for the Barrage Glitch in PhoneScape based servers. When PhoneCheck released he posted the fix but now the topics been deleted. Anybody post it for me please.

item.title: Barrage Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Liam123 Liam123
item.description:
@Liam123 wrote:

Lol, iv’e made multiple clients. Phonecheck was a good friend of mine tbh. He posted the glitch fix, and the topics been deleted so i have no idea what the glitch is. Phonecheck has quit moparscape/coding or w/e and hardly comes on msn, So iv’e been trying to figure it out my self. Just asked for help thats all, but i get abuse from a retarded dumbass that can’t spell. Ok, Now GTFO this topic, You’r starting to piss me off.

Ps, When i make work i don’t release it.

Read full topic

item.title: Barrage Glitch
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Lol, Wooot, gratz on your posting time, maybe 3-4 minutes… and if your spells worked, why mess with them? have you got a problem or something lol? why would you want to change something that works … . … . . . . . . . . . … . . . . . . … . . . . . … . . ? Phonescape or Phoncheck or w/e… that server almost came complete, the only thing you can do to that source now is add codes n sum other voids n shit… have you thought about actually making a client or something? & dude, im grown up enough, it just pisses me off when it comes to kids like you…

Read full topic
